mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SID, PRODUCTID, MANUFACTURE, ORDERNUM, INPORTPRICE, AMOUNT, INPORTTIME, ACTUALNUM, ACTUALPRICE, ACTUALAMOUNT, STOCKOPER, STOCKTIME, SLEVEL, STATUS, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, SAVENUM, CORPID, OPENFLAG, MANUFACTUREID, GROUPID, RECEIVENUM, RETURNNUM, PAYFLAG, DISCOUNT1, DISCOUNT2, DISCOUNT3, DISCOUNT4, HAVEPAYED, NOTPAYED, PAYMENTTYPE, SEVENNUM, THREENUM, NINENUM, CREATOPER, CREATDATE, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, RESERVE14, PURCHASEINDEXID, UNITEFLAG, PURCHASEFLAG, SENDTIME, SHIPNUM, GIFTNUM, PAYMENTID, RECEIVEOPER, RECEIVETIME, DESCR, RESERVE3, NAME, REMARKS, RESERVE11, RESERVE12, RESERVE13, PRODUCTNAME, RESERVE15 from db_purchase where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, SID, PRODUCTID, MANUFACTURE, ORDERNUM, INPORTPRICE, AMOUNT, INPORTTIME, ACTUALNUM, ACTUALPRICE, ACTUALAMOUNT, STOCKOPER, STOCKTIME, SLEVEL, STATUS, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, SAVENUM, CORPID, OPENFLAG, MANUFACTUREID, GROUPID, RECEIVENUM, RETURNNUM, PAYFLAG, DISCOUNT1, DISCOUNT2, DISCOUNT3, DISCOUNT4, HAVEPAYED, NOTPAYED, PAYMENTTYPE, SEVENNUM, THREENUM, NINENUM, CREATOPER, CREATDATE, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, RESERVE14, PURCHASEINDEXID, UNITEFLAG, PURCHASEFLAG, SENDTIME, SHIPNUM, GIFTNUM, PAYMENTID, RECEIVEOPER, RECEIVETIME, DESCR, RESERVE3, NAME, REMARKS, RESERVE11, RESERVE12, RESERVE13, PRODUCTNAME, RESERVE15 from db_purchase
mapper.sql: SEQUENCEID , SID , PRODUCTID , MANUFACTURE , ORDERNUM , INPORTPRICE , AMOUNT , INPORTTIME , ACTUALNUM , ACTUALPRICE , ACTUALAMOUNT , STOCKOPER , STOCKTIME , SLEVEL , STATUS , OPER , OPERTIME , RESERVE1 , RESERVE2 , RESERVE4 , RESERVE5 , SAVENUM , CORPID , OPENFLAG , MANUFACTUREID , GROUPID , RECEIVENUM , RETURNNUM , PAYFLAG , DISCOUNT1 , DISCOUNT2 , DISCOUNT3 , DISCOUNT4 , HAVEPAYED , NOTPAYED , PAYMENTTYPE , SEVENNUM , THREENUM , NINENUM , CREATOPER , CREATDATE , RESERVE6 , RESERVE7 , RESERVE8 , RESERVE9 , RESERVE10 , RESERVE14 , PURCHASEINDEXID , UNITEFLAG , PURCHASEFLAG , SENDTIME , SHIPNUM , GIFTNUM , PAYMENTID , RECEIVEOPER , RECEIVETIME , DESCR , RESERVE3 , NAME , REMARKS , RESERVE11 , RESERVE12 , RESERVE13 , PRODUCTNAME , RESERVE15

SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
MANUFACTURE = #{manufacture,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ORDERNUM = #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and

RETURNNUM = #{returnnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
PAYFLAG = #{payflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
DISCOUNT1 = #{discount1,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and

DISCOUNT3 = #{discount3,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
DISCOUNT4 = #{discount4,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
HAVEPAYED = #{havepayed,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and

NINENUM = #{ninenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and

RESERVE14 = #{reserve14,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
PURCHASEINDEXID = #{purchaseindexid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
UNITEFLAG = #{uniteflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and

SENDTIME = #{sendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
SHIPNUM = #{shipnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
GIFTNUM = #{giftnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
PAYMENTID = #{paymentid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RECEIVEOPER = #{receiveoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RECEIVETIME = #{receivetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and

NAME = #{name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE11 = #{reserve11,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE12 = #{reserve12,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE13 = #{reserve13,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
PRODUCTNAME = #{productname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE15 = #{reserve15,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
